column1: 821112,"Drainage, Sewerage and Stormwater Labourer",,"Maintain or repair plumbing or drainage structures or fixtures
column5: Inspect plumbing or drainage systems or fixtures
column7: Review blueprints or specifications to determine work requirements
column11: Communicate with other construction or mining staff to discuss project details
column21: Compact or smooth materials to create level bases
column27: Mark reference points on construction materials
column33: Assist skilled construction or mining staff
column35: Mix substances or compounds needed for work activities
column39: Pour materials into, or on, designated areas
column43: Calculate specific material, equipment or labour requirements
column49: Locate equipment or materials in need of repair or replacement",0.08189077922722088
